1) in general, meaning what is in a certain place and how things are happening there. the term is similar to but not the same as གནས་ལུགས་. this term is mostly used to refer to the situation as it is in any given moment where the other is used to mean the actuality, the inner reality of any situation. E.g., this term would be used in a newspaper to mean "the current situation in such and such place" whereas the other term would never be used for that. the other term if used for that place would mean the inner, unchanging reality of the place.
